column4: hi there, i've just installed feisty fawn and there's no voice
have no idea what's the problem
what do you mean by "other sounds"? i can open every songs or movies with my player but i don't hear anything
that's what i meant. you don't get any sound at all, right?
did you check the volume on your speakers, and the volume control in ubuntu?
go to System > Prefs > Sound, and play around in there. see if you can get any sound from that
is sound playback set to esd?
i've changed it everywhere to esd but there's no difference
also, make sure your speakers are plugged in the proper place (like, not the mic spot)
when i was running the ubuntu cd everything worked fine
when you installed, how did you do it?
there's a shortcut when running the live version to 'install to disk'. if the live disc worked, you might try that
